description: The configuration of a replication controller.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

spec.description: The specification of the desired behavior of the replication controller.

status.description: The most recently observed status of the replication controller. This data may be out of date by some window of time. Populated by the system. Read-only.
